item.title: Paul Simon - Me and Julio Down by the Schoolyard - Key of A - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Me and Julio Down by the Schoolyard by Paul Simon from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: A, B7, D, E, G.

item.description: Play along video for the song Can't Help Falling In Love by Elvis from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: A, B7, Bm, C♯7, D, Em, G.
